content: उ {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (अवते, ऊवे, औष्ट, ओतुं, उत) {@--1@} To sound, make a noise. {@--2@} To roar, bellow (as a bull &c.). {vII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (उनोति) <ab>Ved.</ab> To ask, demand.

उः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva, the second of the three syllables in ओम्; see अ. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Brahmā. {@--3@} The orb of the moon. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} As a particle used expletively; उ उमेशः <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} An interjection of:-- ({%a%}) calling; उ मेति मात्रा तपसो निषिद्धा पश्चादुमाख्यां सुमुखी जगाम <ls>Ku. 1. 26</ls>; ({%b%}) anger; ({%c%}) compassion; ({%d%}) command; ({%e%}) acceptance; ({%f%}) interrogation; or ({%g%}) used merely as an expletive. In the Veda used as an enclitic copula implying restriction and emphasis (and, but, on the other hand, now, I ask &c.); in classical literature used chiefly with अथ (अथो), न (नो) and किम् (किमु); see these words. उ-उ or उत on the one hand-on the other hand, partly-partly.
